page.title: 06ADULT RECREATION BROUGH AREA
page.content: 1. Humber Yawl Club: 500 members. Annual subscription Â£20, berthing facilities for approximately 70 boats. 2. Brough Golf Club: Annual subscription Â£30 for juniors, Â£250 full membership. 5500m 68 par course. 3. Ionians Rugby and Cricket Club: sited in Elloughton, runs 5 rugby and 2 cricket teams. 300 members, subscriptions Â£10 for playing, Â£3 non_playing. 4. Welton Hockey and Cricket Club: 200 members. Subscriptions Â£28 hockey, Â£18 cricket, Â£1 associate member. 5. Brough Aero Club: Private flying instruction at British Aerospace. 60 members, some with their own aircraft. 6. Various sports facilities offered to British Aerospace employees and families include football, tennis, cricket, squash, table tennis, & bowls
